thread.section_title: Logoscientist Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Logoscientist | logoscientist.net
thread.title: Barbara Muratore

author: Barbara Muratore
title: Barbara Muratore
text: I have been working with Ben Thompson and his team for several months now on a design for a small home business that I have started up. Communications began immediately and lasted until completion on a consistent basis. Information provided was reworked until perfection. My web design is now complete and we are working on the final stages of my business card design. Again, I could not have been more pleased with the outcome and would highly recommend Logoscientist for your designing needs. Thank you. Barbara Muratore
